text: 399 comments anime The Winter 2017 Anime Preview Guide has begun! Check back daily for fresh reviews of the entire winter anime season. Available Now: KONOSUBA season 2 - Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid - Kemono Friends - Hand Shakers - ACCA: 13-Territory Inspection Dept. - Gabriel DropOut - Tales of Zestiria the X - ēlDLIVE - Idol Incidents - Interviews with Monster Girls - Seiren - and much more! ― Welcome to Anime New... survey Jan 11, 13:44 anime From Fruits Basket to Black Butler to Gurren Lagann, we're bringing classic streaming reviews back, and we need your help deciding which shows to cover! feature
